title: ABOUT AUDIO WALK
descrip: An extraordinary adventure in the old town of Briançon! Travel through time, and visit the Vauban city in a different way. Let us frighten and surprise you as we guide you through the alleys and passages. You will be transported back in time and hear the tales of the fires that have ravaged the town twice, the meeting of witches, and much more! Discover the dark history and legends of Briançon with Briançon Fantômes!

title: YOU NEED
descrip: You will need a smartphone, headphones, and Internet/Data. Briançon Fantômes takes between 60-90 minutes to complete and we recommend to do it in the late afternoon or evening because the atmosphere in the old town of Briançon is mystical as dusk arrives.

title: WARNING
descrip: Briançon Fantômes is not for the faint-hearted! Children under 8 years old are not recommended to listen to the audio tour. The town is steep and has uneven surfaces, please pay attention while walking through and around the old town. Stop in a safe area when listening to the audio for the tour.
